name: Tornado Warning
description:
In 2014, you saved cats in Tornado Warning 1. In 2015, you ran for your house in Tornado Warning 2. And now, in 2017, you're just doing your job picking corn.

___________________________________

Play as Brenden as you run for your life against Mother Nature's version of the middle finger. But, you get paid to pick sweet corn over the summer, so that should give you a good reason to be out there.

___________________________________

Keyboard:

[Arrow keys] Move

[Z] Jump

[Enter] Start game

[Select] ???

___________________________________

Xbox Controller:

[Left Thumbstick] Move

[A] Jump

[Start] Start game

[Back] ???

___________________________________

The term "Tornado Warning" is not mine, as it belongs to the National Weather Service. The name of the game is not subject to copyright protection. See www.weather.gov for more info.
